Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Prohibits executive sessions for the appointment of elected office
Summary: Prohibits public bodies from conducting an executive session where the subject to be considered relates to the appointment of an elected member or officer to fill a vacancy in an elected office of such public body, including interviews of prospective appointees and related discussions.
LawCode: Amd ยง105, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to prohibiting executive sessions for the appointment of elected office
